mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getPaymentMethods */ SELECT a.user_id AS 'userId', b.user_name AS 'seller.userName', a.method_seq AS 'methodSeq', (SELECT label FROM cmm_code WHERE category = 'COMM' AND type = 'PAYMENT_METHOD' AND value = a.payment_method) AS 'paymentMethodCodeName', (SELECT label FROM cmm_code WHERE category = 'COMM' AND type = 'BANK' AND value = a.bank_name) AS 'bankNameCodeName', a.payment_method AS 'paymentMethod', a.bank_name AS 'bankName', a.bank_bsb AS 'bankBsb', a.bank_account_no AS 'bankAccountNo', a.bank_account_owner_name AS 'bankAccountOwnerName', a.use_yn AS 'useYn', a.create_datetime AS 'createDatetime', a.modify_datetime AS 'modifyDatetime', a.creator AS 'creator' FROM shopping_payment_method a LEFT OUTER JOIN cmm_user b ON b.user_id = a.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.method_seq = #{methodSeq} AND a.payment_method = #{paymentMethod} AND a.bank_name = #{bankName} AND a.bank_bsb LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bankBsb}, '%') AND a.bank_account_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bankAccountNo}, '%') AND a.bank_account_owner_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bankAccountOwnerName}, '%') AND UPPER(a.use_yn) = UPPER(#{useYn}) AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator}) ORDER BY a.method_seq ASC, a.create_datetime ASC LIMIT #{pagenationPage}, #{pagenationPageSize}
/* QUERY ID : getNextPaymentMethodSeq */ SELECT CASE WHEN max(method_seq) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE (max(method_seq) + 1) END FROM shopping_payment_method WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: /* QUERY ID : insertPaymentMethod */ INSERT INTO shopping_payment_method (user_id ,method_seq ,payment_method ,bank_name ,bank_bsb ,bank_account_no ,bank_account_owner_name ,use_yn ,creator) VALUES ( #{userId} ,#{methodSeq} ,UPPER(#{paymentMethod}) ,UPPER(#{bankName}) ,TRIM(#{bankBsb}) ,TRIM(#{bankAccountNo}) ,TRIM(#{bankAccountOwnerName}) ,UPPER(TRIM(#{useYn})) ,#{creator})
mapper.update: /* QUERY ID : modifyPaymentMethod */ UPDATE shopping_payment_method SET modify_datetime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,payment_method = UPPER(#{paymentMethod}) ,bank_name = UPPER(#{bankName}) ,bank_bsb = TRIM(#{bankBsb}) ,bank_account_no = TRIM(#{bankAccountNo}) ,bank_account_owner_name = TRIM(#{bankAccountOwnerName}) ,use_yn = UPPER(TRIM(#{useYn})) ,creator = TRIM(#{creator}) WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND method_seq = #{methodSeq}

/* QUERY ID : modifyPaymentMethodForNotNull */ UPDATE shopping_payment_method SET modify_datetime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , payment_method = TRIM(#{paymentMethod}) , payment_method = TRIM(#{bankName}) , payment_method = TRIM(#{bankBsb}) , payment_method = TRIM(#{bankAccountNo}) , payment_method = TRIM(#{bankAccountOwnerName}) , use_yn = UPPER(TRIM(#{useYn})) creator = TRIM(#{creator}) WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND method_seq = #{methodSeq}
mapper.delete: /* QUERY ID : deletePaymentMethod */ DELETE FROM shopping_payment_method WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND method_seq = #{methodSeq}
